attributes.action: finally recognise that Global Warming is a Myth, and that it is cyclical
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the start of the decade, all politicians seem to blabber on about Global Warming, when, in fact, the change in temperatures is due to a varying el nino or la nina in the South Pacific. Global temperatures for 2007/2008/2009 have been decreasing because of a weakening el nino. Sea levels are not rising, the data was based on 1 reading made in Singapore. Now, let's stop all the rubbish, and get onto more important things.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
